title: Colorado Communities 1914-2014 Fund
description: To provide funding for a digital collection of artifacts of our states history at the UCB Libraries at the University of Colorado Boulder. Once the project is complete, any excess funds will be used to support the UCB Libraries.
marketingContent: To provide funding for a digital collection of artifacts of our states history at the UCB Libraries at the University of Colorado Boulder. Once the project is complete, any excess funds will be used to support the UCB Libraries.
